GSD.description:
ax25: Fix UAF bugs in ax25 timers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.112 by commit 5c62d3bf14100a88d30888b925fcb61a8c11c012. For more details please see the references link.
